intro: Hop, Toggle, and Train Like a True Ninja!
description:
Leap into a world of calm precision and clever rhythm in this 2D platformer where every jump changes everything. You play as a brave ninja bunny in training, mastering the art of movement where each leap toggles platforms, spikes, and saws on or off. Timing isn’t just important, it’s everything.
With smooth controls, double jumps, and wall jumps, you’ll flow through 30 handcrafted levels that blend platforming and puzzle-solving in a uniquely relaxing way. Each stage is short, focused, and satisfying, perfect for players who enjoy smart challenges or love hunting for achievements.
Plan your jumps, find your rhythm, and reach the torii gate to prove you’ve earned your black belt.
Features
• 30 handcrafted stages filled with clever platform puzzles
• Jump to toggle platforms, spikes, and saws on or off
• Double jump and wall jump mechanics for flexible movement
• A calm and readable challenge perfect for casual players
• Checkpoints and instant retries for frustration-free fun
Train your mind and reflexes as you turn every jump into a perfect act of ninja mastery. The path to the torii awaits, one hop at a time.
